perlin - Variable in class tk.shardsoftware.WorldMap
 
PerlinNoiseGenerator - Class in tk.shardsoftware.util
Based on the Perlin Noise algorithm by Ken Perlin, specifically the method described here: https://adrianb.io/2014/08/09/perlinnoise.html
You can view the original algorithm as described by Perlin here: https://mrl.cs.nyu.edu/~perlin/paper445.pdf
PerlinNoiseGenerator(float, float, int, float, float, float, int, int, long) - Constructor for class tk.shardsoftware.util.PerlinNoiseGenerator
 
permutationTable - Variable in class tk.shardsoftware.util.PerlinNoiseGenerator
 
persistence - Variable in class tk.shardsoftware.util.PerlinNoiseGenerator
The amplitude is adjusted by this value for each octave, i.e the higher persistence is the more effect each nth octave has
